title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer to lead our web application projects using Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. You will be responsible for building scalable, high-performance applications and mentoring junior developers.
requirements: Strong experience with React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Proficient in Node.js and Express.
Experience with PostgreSQL or MongoDB.
Knowledge of AWS services (S3, EC2, Lambda).
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Join our creative team to design intuitive and visually stunning user interfaces. You will work closely with product managers and developers to turn complex requirements into delightful user experiences.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite.
Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design projects.
Experience with user research and usability testing.
Understanding of responsive design principles.
Knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus.

title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: We are seeking a Frontend Developer focused on building clean, performant, and responsive user interfaces. You will be working primarily with React and modern CSS frameworks.
requirements: Solid understanding of React.js and its ecosystem.
Proficient in CSS/SCSS and responsive design.
Experience with state management (Redux, Zustand, etc.).
Familiarity with REST APIs and GraphQL.
Detail-oriented with a passion for clean code.

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop robust and scalable server-side logic and database schemas. You will be responsible for building secure APIs and ensuring the overall performance of our backend systems.
requirements: Strong command over Node.js and Express.
Experience with relational databases like PostgreSQL.
Familiarity with Redis and caching strategies.
Understanding of microservices architecture.
Experience with Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
